metadata.description:
90 pages!
Join Tom Dull, today's deadbeat and tomorrow's superstar, as he dons a musical afro that will change his life forever. Will he use it to save the world from The Mange or use it for personal gain? Enjoy this punny story featuring one of the most amazing bands of our time, a hilarious mix of music and adventure, and the birth of today's greatest American zero!
metadata.name: The Fro
